Kettering.Fairbrook Elementary School: Fairbrook Elementary School is an elementary school located in Beavercreek, Ohio, USA and is part of the Beavercreek City School District that educates students in grades K-5. The principal is Joell A. Mangan The school has been recognized as a Blue Ribbon School. It has been described as "a great school of character" and is notable for having a multi-handicapped unit.
